Individuals That Data Matching Identifies
The data matching referenced in
M21-1, Part XIV, 7.1.b
identifies Veterans, dependents, and survivors that have been incarcerated.
Use the table below to determine the individual being identified in the data match.

Veteran receiving disability compensation, or
surviving spouse receiving DIC.
